mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Reynolds, Joseph Jones
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Pierpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling July 29 1861. By Telegraph from Camp Cheat Mountain Pass 1861. Can you confine the men named in Mr. Cranes letter to the Commander of Camp Beverly & keep them at Wheeling if we will arrest them & send them forward it will be troublesome for us to guard them here. J.J. Reynolds Brig Gen Cmdg 40D125pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Reynolds, Joseph Jones
Camp Cheat Mountain Pass
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
